VISION & MISSION
----------------

FACULTY OF MANAGEMENT
=====================

The Faculty of Management (FM), UTM offers a broad rage of academic programmes which will develop and enhance your knowledge and understanding, cognitive, functional work, personal, and entrepreneurial skills; ethnics and professionalism. The faculty is located in main campus at UTM Johor Bahru focusing to strengthen academic programme offerings in the field of contemporary management that is bended with technology and digital

Establish in 1991, FM has been producing graduates with innovative and entrepreneurial skill for a wide range of industry, organization and cultural context. Choosing the Faculty of Management means you becoming part of UTM community of international academic and research partners. local and national employers and alumni if more than 200,000 graduates in over 98 countries. In 2022, our Graduate Employability is 100%

Vision
======

A place for nurturing creative leaders in shaping the future.

Mission
=======

The Faculty of Management in a technology-based university commits to develop future-oriented graduates by upholding agility, curiosity and diversity through transdisciplinary contemporary management education to meet global needs
